website_summaries.verdict: The perfect camera for the selfie-obsessed, Instagram-addicted, and Snap-chatter extraordinaire.
pros: This model features a selfie mode, and it's great for taking photos in low-light conditions thanks to an auto-exposure mode
The shutter button is appropriately placed to make it easy to take great selfies

customer_reviews.title: Great! Deducted one star because no film included
customer_reviews.text: I love this little camera. I'm very much an amateur photographer but I love to take photos and pretend I'm a pro! This little camera is great once you learn how to use the setting and the surrounding light, youl create beautiful photos. I took one star away because it comes with no film... come on. At least include a 10 pack to get people started.
customer_reviews.author: AmyKay87

customer_reviews.title: This camera is great! I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great! I highly recommend it, the quality is great. All of the settings are really awesome too. I love the touch of the selfie mirror on the front! The camera comes with batteries, a strap, and 10 pack of film!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good when it works, delicate, poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: I like the camera, worked well for the most part though getting good exposure was tricky. The main problem was that after the first load of film (which worked fine) it would no longer load new film. I was travelling at the time, so this was a major bummer. I took it to a local Fujifilm office, and they were unable to fix it. I had to buy a new camera so I had it on this trip. I eventually sent it in for repair to Fujifilm, they quoted $92 which is more than the cost of new.
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN A CAMERON

customer_reviews.title: Beware: works once and then dies/malfunctions forever
customer_reviews.text: This has happened to many of us based on the reviews I've read. I used it one time on one single night, and now it flashes E no matter what I do to troubleshoot (new batteries, new film, all the YouTube videos in the world...). Such a huge waste of time and money. My worst Amazon purchase to date...
customer_reviews.author: A Person Who Buys Things

customer_reviews.title: we've tried a couple times and the pictures come with great quality and it's simple and easy to use I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friends wedding Journal, we've tried a couple times and the pictures come with great quality and it's simple and easy to use I love that it has the feature for the timer. The size it's good and overall it's a great camera. I love the idea that you can have the picture and your hands in seconds. You just have to make sure that you know how to put the films in which was a bit confusing at first. But they did a great job with this cameras I'm planning to buy for my nephew's birthday. Since I think it's super cool to have the pictures in your hands and see it come alive
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for about 3 weeks and it is wonderful. I have shot about 30 pictures with it and they all have a very nice vintage tinge. It is easy to operate and MUCH lighter than I thought. The settings are nice for taking pictures in low lit college suites when everyone is hanging. Would definitely recommend this to anyone, it is so nice to have an instant photo. My only warning is not about the camera but the film, each picture is about $.60 so don't go crazy shooting pics.
customer_reviews.author: ty

customer_reviews.title: Bday gift
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this camera to a ten ur. Old not so complex to use very easy and usable just pop batteries get film which is not included then boom ! Ready to use . Can not see the picture before printing giving a heads up but definitely easy to just aim and shoot the pic. Pic print really good just like a instant camera for the price can’t get any better. Happy girl when she saw the camera any child would get excited especially when they see the pic print out . It’s a very cool cámara light weight too . Was surprised to see how good it actually is as the price is accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Xiomara

customer_reviews.title: Great Insta camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our granddaughter for Christmas. I did some research before purchasing an found a great YouTube video by a woman who has a great grasp of the Fuji line of Insta cameras. I chose the Mini 70 as it has more features and the looks are a bit better than the entry level camera and it was only a few dollars more than the basic camera. It is easy enough for a 11 year old to operate and it is built rugged.
customer_reviews.author: Skip Tribby

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and a lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: Look, you're not getting professional quality prints out of this thing. But it's fun and easy to use and has been a big hit at a few parties, and most recently when my girlfriend took it with her along with a bridal part for a wedding she was in. They had a ton of fun with it on the party bus and at the reception. You have to be a little mindful of when the flash is/isn't going to operate so you don't wind up wildly overexposed, but the camera seems to be pretty clever most of the time and you get a decent exposure.
customer_reviews.author: P. DeCastro

customer_reviews.title: Unique and classy
customer_reviews.text: My first Polaroid camera and I just am loving it. Such a beautiful rose gold color to it and unique style. I was not into those other chunky polaroid camera styles and im glad this is an option! I love that it has the little selfie mirror so you can take pictures of yourself , landscape and other features for different shots. I put a strap around it to be able to carry over my shoulder, so lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: torres

customer_reviews.title: Was very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use at grad party, big hit! Guests were asked to take a pic, tape in journal and write advice, wishes. Was very easy to use, pics served the purpose and ended up being a great memento. Very happy with the decision to do this :)
customer_reviews.author: wendy b.

customer_reviews.title: Its alright.
customer_reviews.text: I like how it has the film indicator to let you know if it has or does not have film in it some pictures come out great some not so much just because you aren't allowed to turn the flash off so that sucks because I've taken a few pictures in a room with plenty of lighting and the flash goes off and then the picture has too much exposure in it and doesn't turn out so good but for the most part its a nice gift for someone who isn't super picky about their pictures or has little knowledge about cameras and has preferences.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Summerville

customer_reviews.title: Favorite fujifilm instax to date
customer_reviews.text: My instax mini 8(discontinued) broke because some film that I purchased was damaged and got stuck in the cartridge slot, so I would double check film anytime you slide it in. I'm glad that happened because this one is way better. It has various settings and has a selfie timer if you want to set the camera down and include yourself in the photograph.
customer_reviews.author: Lizbeth Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Must have for a girls room
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had mentioned wanting one of these cameras, so I ordered her one for Christmas. 2 of her brothers that are in college both laughed when she opened it and said the pictures are practically mandatory for a girls dorm room. Since she is about to graduate I guess I bought it just in time.
customer_reviews.author: Tom D

customer_reviews.title: Great functionality at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so excited to use this camera on upcoming vacations! I’ve only used it a few times so far because I don’t want to waste the film but as of yet I love it. The look, functionality, and price is a 10/10 for me. I was choosing between this and the 90 but ultimately chose this one because I didn’t really need the extra features of the 90. I can tell this camera will be great for vacation photos and it’s very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: D.O.A.
customer_reviews.text: Received an “E” error message the first time I attempted to turn it on brand new out of the box. Going to return it and repurchase another one, I’ll update my review once I try the second one. Hoping I get my film replaced as it was stuck in the camera as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rubi

customer_reviews.title: Vintage yet modern ~
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this camera, it's super stylish, color is great (all the colors look great). it's light weight, a little sleeker than the older model. No complaints - looking forward to many polaroid memories.
customer_reviews.author: Eevee

customer_reviews.title: Great instant camera!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this camera as it makes shooting quick instant prints a breeze. The only drawback is that even when the flash mode is turned off, it will almost always still flash, even when out in bright, natural light. I've learned to just plan to use the flash with each photo and it works well like that. The camera is compact and easy to carry around. I love the color of this too!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Such a nice little addition to a camera collection
customer_reviews.text: It has a great look, and it works super well. The pictures are turning out great, and it is just something fun to have to add to a camera collection. I hang these up on string lights in my room, and it makes it my space. I am using it for my wedding so that guests can take their own photos and hang them up for me. I thought it was a nice personal touch, and it gives me confidence that everyone will be able to have fun with it and use it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Trust me - GET IT
customer_reviews.text: If you're debating getting this camera or not, do yourself a favor and just get it. It looks more sophisticated than the other instax cameras, which look more like toys I'd buy for my kids. The picture quality is great, too. Just make sure you've selected the proper mode for the pic you're trying to take. They're all explained pretty well in the manual. It comes with 2 batteries, but be aware that it does not come with film, unless you get the bundle. Also, it arrived a day early which was fantastic! Honestly, get off the fence and get this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Myers

customer_reviews.title: Nice little camera for tweens and teens.
customer_reviews.text: I returned the camera only because my granddaughter wanted something else but my friend bought one and her granddaughter loves it. It's a fun little camera and fine for children who want to pin pictures to a wall board or to share with friends. If you shop around you can get deals in film. The film is expensive but there are deals out there.
customer_reviews.author: gloria trier

customer_reviews.title: I love this Polaroid Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is simple and easy to use. Its not as clunky as the original and looks super sleek, i got it in white. The selfie mirror is surprisingly functional, i have used it for trips around the world. I don't fully understand all the modes, but that's more of a me problem than the camera's problem. I think this is great for anyone who likes having tangible memories at the push of a button. Great gift also, I'm happy I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: MISSING PHOTO PAPER
customer_reviews.text: This product was supposed to come with 10 sheets of photo paper and mine had NONE.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Rayburn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera, but the film in the buddle was expired
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Super easy to use. Beautiful color, and easy set up. Bummer that the film it comes with expired in May though. Be careful if you order the green bundle, and make sure you buy extra film. Instructions warn you not to use expired film, so had to toss it. Wish I would have known because I bought the bundle to get film with it. Oh well, still an amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: sshouse

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I had so much taking pics of me and my friends on vacation. These are so fun to have. I missed the old poloroids back in the day, but I like the small pictures better and the instance of them. PS. The only thing I say it's hard to find CR2 batteries, do you have any options for them online to purchase. Thanks Angela Farr
customer_reviews.author: Angela Joy

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for a fun novelty item
customer_reviews.text: It's mostly ok. Tends to use the flash whenever it wants, not much consistency with that. Would be nice if you could choose an absolute NO flash option to be sure it isn't used when you know it doesn't need to be. Truly wanted the gold one but for some reason it isn't available for Prime shipping and I wasn't going to wait up to 5 weeks for it.
customer_reviews.author: Alyss

customer_reviews.title: Good camera.... its actually a better camera than expected
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had a view option before printing. Good camera.... its actually a better camera than expected... you have to be good at taking pictures.... or you'll end up wasting film
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Young

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! I’ve been wanting a Polaroid for a while now and finally decided on this one! I love the timer setting so my friends and I can take group pics together. The lighting quality is very good; I’ve taken pictures in darker areas and the photos still come out clear. Great way to take pics for a quick keepsake! Definitely play around with the settings so you find the best one.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: So fun! Great value!
customer_reviews.text: So I just received this camera and will update after I really use it. The five stars is based solely on value. I bought the blue camera for $78 only because the white one wasn't one day shipping and I needed it before I leave for Vegas day after tomorrow 😂 I looked on other stores websites to see if I could find a better deal but no dice. This camera is almost $20 cheaper than anywhere else. It also comes with a wrist strap, batteries, and 10 rainbow sheets of film which was all a bonus in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Works nicely. Follow instructions to use and
customer_reviews.text: A little more detailed information that. I thought I'd have to learn on how to use it and load the film and everything else but after a few times I'll remember it just fine. Works well. It's obviously not going to have phone camera quality pictures but for the insta print aspect and vibe it's worked great.
customer_reviews.author: haley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift with a touch of warm and fuzzy nostalgia
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Got it for my wife as a bday gift and we’ve had a ton of fun with it since. Great to take out for any special events or fun nights out. The pictures come out great and they’re fun to give away to friends or collect. The brushed metal gives it a classy and high quality look. Film isn’t too expensive if you buy it in bulk. Overall a great gift almost anyone would have fun with.
customer_reviews.author: BDeLoach

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. My kids love it. And my wedding clients love it. it's just a super cool and easy to use instant film camera with surprisingly good image quality. If you're on the fence, just go ahead and get one. Printing out photos is always fun and the memories made are well worth the price of the camera and film.
customer_reviews.author: Otto Rascon

customer_reviews.title: She absolutely love it. We now bring this camera on our ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my girlfriend birthday. She absolovGot this for my girlfriend birthday. She absolutely love it. We now bring this camera on our trips. Unlike the previous version the selfie mirror and setting is a plus. This allow us to get the correct position when he picture is taken. A+++
customer_reviews.author: KKMEAL

customer_reviews.title: Darker pictures than expected
customer_reviews.text: The pictures are darker and more vintage than I wanted. However, this camera is really easy to use. Has a nice look to it and works really well. I would still purchase again as well as gift this to someone. If your lighting is impeccable then your pics will come out good. Otherwise they are a bit dark.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Portable.
customer_reviews.text: I had the instax mini 8 for about three years. It finally broke and I decided to purchase another instax. I went for this one because I liked how it had more features and the design/color was just my taste. It's very similar to the mini instax 8 so I love how easy it is for me to use. I also love the features it consists of. It took me a while to get the hang of the macro feature. I don't use it often, but when I did I was doing it the wrong way. I finally watched a video that showed me how to use it properly and it made my experience 10xs better.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: 17 years old is pleased :)
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun little camera... The photos develop quickly... Unfortunely, the pictures are not always very clear.. Lighting has to be just right in order to get a good crisp print... That being said... My 17 year old daughter loves it and has the little prints hanging by clothes pins on a string all over her room... No complaints from her or her friends.
customer_reviews.author: C.M

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is just delightful. Modern meets classic. Used about 4 film clips so far and no issues. Solid sturdy build and quality manufacturing. Got this as a birthday gift for my 10year old daughter and she simply adores it. Easy to use and with the selfie mirror, timer, and double photo selfie setting she can take pics with her friends with ease. Simple to use and so awesome having instant photos. We've loved using the camera in so many settings already. I highly recommend. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ramirez Family

customer_reviews.title: Ive only had it for about 6 months and it already stopped working??
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for about 6 months and it already stopped working?? Is showing the letter E and I removed the batteries and put them back in and it still didn't work. Not sure how I'm able to fix it or how it even broke to start with. Big waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: lee espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Updated Polariod
customer_reviews.text: I was on the hunt for a new polaroid camera since I had broken mine after many years of having it. I was attracted to this camera mainly sue to the color of it. I love that it's somewhat digital so it makes it even easier to use. It also comes with a selfie mode & mirror as well as a timer for those group photos you've tried to capture on a polaroid!! Def recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Can’t turn off flash
customer_reviews.text: The camera is really cute and all but I didn’t know you can’t turn off the flash. Like it the camera thinks there should be flash, there’s gonna be a flash. You can’t avoid it. Which kinda sucks bc even if the lighting is dim, and seems like good lighting. The camera will do a flash and then the whole pictures is actually super dark.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I have only taken one picture with it so far because the films are expensive and I want to use them wisely but so far so good! The picture was taken indoors and it was a selfie, it came out pretty clear and had plenty of light. Can't wait to explore it more.
customer_reviews.author: Sumeyra Gok

customer_reviews.title: Fun Camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun camera to use. I love all the awesome film you can use with this that has characters around the edges of the pictures like Hello Kitty, Gudetama, Disney, stars, and many more. Of course you are not going to get digital quality, but pictures are pretty nice. It's nice to have pictures to hang up instantly and our refrigerator is getting covered with pictures, especially because we use the film with cute borders. Just a really fun camera to use.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera but the downside is that film is so ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my sister a few years back. Awesome camera but the downside is that film is so expensive, she hardly uses it due to that fact.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Super Cool
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like about the camera is that the photos are small and not large like the old-school polaroid. But I knew the photos would be small when I purchased, so no surprise. Easy to use, cute pictures, great memories.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Betsill

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Fun Little Camera!
customer_reviews.text: The camera is lots of fun. I love the mirror on the camera for selfies or group selfies . The picture quality is pretty good, but you have to be close to the camera to get good pics. Also lighting plays a big factor. But overall I would recommend this camera to anyone who likes to have fun and to get instant pics! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: LJA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the camera is in pretty good shape. I couldn’t tell that it has been used before besides the fact that it doesn’t come with the original stuff like the batteries, wrist strap and more (bought it refurbished.) But for the price I think it’s worth it! Haven’t tested out all of the settings yet but I definitely will.
customer_reviews.author: Lxnie

customer_reviews.title: Fun retro inspired camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera works like a charm. You'll need lots of bright natural light for decent pictures. They wont be pro quality but still very beautiful keepsakes with an awesome built in retro vibe. I love this product I just wish the film weren't so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: RomayneK

customer_reviews.title: There is an unlisted extra mode now!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy so far, there must have been a software revision at some point because there is an extra mode called "soft flash" that decreases the flash output a bit in case your subject is semi close and very white as to not overexpose the image. Strangely this info is not found anywhere on the internet, not even on Fujifilms website! Only in the paper manual. Otherwise, this thing takes excellent pictures! I'm glad I don't have to fiddle with the exposure ring like on the lower models.
customer_reviews.author: Stefano Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Dead after a pack
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera last year as a gift. It was used 12 times (A pack and 2 pictures) for some reason it woudln't turn on. Bought a new battery (C3 type battery expensive btw) and nothing. No way of fixing it, it would just try to turn on and (made a sound) but nothing on the screen and then it wouldn't make that clicky sound again until I removed the battery and plugged it in. Pictures were good and the ones that took lasted. But I wouldn't recommend buying this camera to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher E.

customer_reviews.title: takes classic pictures!
customer_reviews.text: face recognition, no idea what that means... but takes goos pictures. may be off a little from what you ame it at because tge ete piece/reflector is off to the side of the camera. taking a picture of a picture is basically impossible, but whstever! I love the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Stone

customer_reviews.title: Cute Camera, Expensive Film
customer_reviews.text: I've really enjoyed using this spontaneously since I've received it. I have yet to master the "selfie mode" mainly because you have to take in consideration that the lens it a tiny bit over from where you look at the mirror. I've taken quite a few photos where another person gets cut off. Other than that, the other modes are quite useful, but just make sure you select the right one before taking a picture. I wish they'd at least give you a single pack of film with the camera (I did see the option to get the bundle pack,) but I did purchase the 60 pack separately.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Want this camera to work and I'd love it
customer_reviews.text: It never has worked just flashes E and reset it and it has E that's not flashing. I put new batteries in it and wasted 2 rolls of film. Keep staying on hold for manufacturer up to an hour and keep having to hang up. I wish I knew picture quality and if easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla mattox

customer_reviews.title: More durable than you think
customer_reviews.text: I bought this before a bachelorette party, and it got left outside in the rain overnight. IT STILL TURNED ON, AND STILL TOOK PICS. I did take the film out (which yes, ruins it) and leave the camera to dry out after testing it 1-2 times. It works perfectly fine now with a new film pack. Super fun toy
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for anyone looking for the vintage look
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this camera. I bought this one because i originally had the Fuji max 7, which didn’t offer a self timer and the lighting in photos was horrible. This camera is the opposite it has a self timer and even selfie mode plus different versions to change the lighting. It’s a great purchase and cheaper than the ones in most stores
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to use in conjunction with my travel journal. It’s very easy to use, and for what I need it for, the pictures are the perfect size! It’s unfortunate that it takes cr2 batteries, it’s a bit tricky to find an economical, rechargeable solution. Other than that, it’s definitely worth the extra money to purchase this model over the instax mini 9
customer_reviews.author: Amanda White

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. I used to have the Instax Mini 8 - but my cousin dropped the camera by accident. I decided to buy this one as a replacement. The difference is it has a timer and it has a selfie setting to adjust the lenses - I'm guessing. It's very cute, looks modern and uses the same film as the Instax Mini 8. (Which is convenient because I still had 4 packs)
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Felix

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera! My daughter wanted to be able to take Polaroid pictures with her friends & I needed to find a more affordable option. This is a very nice camera & it produces the same quality pictures of more expensive cameras
customer_reviews.author: ts0215

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today and I wanted to write a quick review that I will edit later when I take pictures. But it looks super cute and it’s super easy to navigate. Edit: The flash is good, the picture quality is the same as the FujiFilm Instax mini 11.
customer_reviews.author: Alishiba balouch

customer_reviews.title: In LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! It's definitely great for people who doesn't have time to actually print photos from their home or at an actual store. With this camera, it develops in SECONDS! I'm still getting used to the different settings but overall, I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: CeeKay

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool little camera. It is durable because my 6 year old loves to take pictures with and thinks its amazing how you have instant pictures. Te he quality of photo is ok they have thenold fashioned look and every now and then you get bad pictures. But all in all great little camera.
customer_reviews.author: amber bell

customer_reviews.title: For FUN, not for something serious.
customer_reviews.text: I mainly like it because it's old school, exciting and RIGHT NOW. It does have a clear photo...but, the lighting is all off. The colors don't come through very well. I tried two different lightings. I'll keep playing with it. BASICALLY, if you want perfect photo prints, don't buy this product. If you want to have fun and photos printed in the moment, this is an awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Its really nice! Smaller than I thought it would be, and lighter, its pretty much perfectly sized for a camera to take with you. It doesn't come with film, but loading and using film I bought separately was really easy to do too.
customer_reviews.author: Zelda0609

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t satisfied with the camera, looked cheap or used or something. Wanted to return it but in the return policy you pay for return shipping which can be costly and not worth shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ughhh it's so cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a bday gift for myself and love it so much! The mini Polaroids are super cute and it's so easy to use. Highly recommend for people wanting to take instant photos and wanting something user friendly
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: The camera is great quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is for my daughter's bday. I initially bought one on e-bay it came damaged, broken and it was sent that way, it did not happen in shipping. The seller was less than trustworthy so I returned it and purchased this on a Friday and received it that Monday. Came brand new in excellent condition. Such a great little gift for an 8-year-old, I couldn't be happier. The pictures remind me of the polaroid I grew up with. It's a blast from the past!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! The color of the polaroid is so cute & I love the features of this camera! I love the little selfie mirror of this polaroid, it makes it easier to take pictures when you don’t have another person to help! Which brings me to another point that there is a “self timing” mode too! I love that there’s other “modes” on it too. I still have to get used to using the other photo modes, but so far so good! I’m so happy I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: I am in love
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with my new Instax camera. The camera arrived in perfect conditions and it works perfectly. I've received my package before the estimation date. I have ordered it on Sunday and I have received it on Tuesday. Great shipping, great object, great seller. I am pretty satisfied about the resolution of the pictures of my polaroid. I really love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad I got this
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I got this. The selfie mirror is a huge plus. I wish I had gotten a case when I purchased it because I'm nervous to bring it with me when I'm out
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Have always wanted one
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend and I to take pictures on a trip. We both hate taking pictures but found this to be enjoyable. This is so easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Blcvnc

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera, learn your modes
customer_reviews.text: Good Polaroid camera especially for the price, sometimes my photos come out blurry like a double exposed photo but most of them are good. The pictures come out well and if they don’t it’s most likely user error, a lot of mine came out poor until I read exactly what each mode was for.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Charrette

customer_reviews.title: So far I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera. It is small but easy to carry but film size is same as before. Easy to use too. But I did not like the flash setting
customer_reviews.author: Hyun

customer_reviews.title: Best camera ever camera 🎥
customer_reviews.text: I love this color! It's very light weight and feels good when holding it and taking a selfie! The photos come out great, just don't forget to play with the settings. It makes a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok not great
customer_reviews.text: When you set up a shot, set it up so the bottom left corner is the middle of the shot. We wasted a lot of film trying to figure this out. Be sure to check out YouTube reviews for other tricks before buying.
customer_reviews.author: mrsruggs

customer_reviews.title: Look like an adult
customer_reviews.text: Taking a "polaroid" is a lot of fun, but we never cared for the look of the old fuji cameras. When we lost our old instax camera we replaced it with this one. We love it every bit as the old one, but now feel more like an adult when we use it in public.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Campau

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: I love the updated instax camera! This one is so easy to use I bought it for my dog business and for everything else. I didn't purchase any film with it because I had my own but it was perfect condition and I love the color. I have no complaints. It included one year on warranty with the camera and the battery's. Everything was great. I do recommend to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Solis

customer_reviews.title: BEST WIFE PRESENT!
customer_reviews.text: I Love the size, as full size cameras are huge! I bought it for my wife as a christmas gift along with several film boxes and she loved it! You must take picture very close up for best print quality, not very good in background details. Good flash for dark moments. LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: jorge

customer_reviews.title: Amazing design and features work well
customer_reviews.text: Awesome features! I upgraded to the 70 from the 26, and I love how sleek the 70 is compared to how bulky and awkward shaped the 26 was.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Weigand

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: Good camera. I purchased this one after owning the mini 8 for a while because I wanted something less bulky. The picture quality is okay but personally think its better on the mini 8
customer_reviews.author: Cora_23

customer_reviews.title: Cute little camera
customer_reviews.text: Cute camera that’s easy to use! The best feature is the selfie mirror on the front! Also, I got it for $40, which is a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel T.

customer_reviews.title: Great to have
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed having this over the holidays and for scrapbooking in general. My recommendation when taking pictures is to stand as close as possible to your object because if you're too far away it makes for a blurry or dark picture in certain lighting. Otherwise, I really enjoy having this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jai

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter she has had plenty of fun with it. Made a collection of her loved ones pictures.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie grullon

customer_reviews.title: fun.
customer_reviews.text: Just left Gulfport MS, on vacation . The camera is old school throw back to instant pictures in your hand for posting or journals . The selfie option is easy to use!!
customer_reviews.author: bassmanbw

customer_reviews.title: Small and cute
customer_reviews.text: I got the yellow and I love how bright of a color it is. My pics are nice and I can’t wait to go on vacation with it 🤗
customer_reviews.author: JUDY

customer_reviews.title: A Great Little Instant Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera because of the fact that it shows the number of photos on a digital small screen, has macro setting, landscape setting, Hi-Key setting and a moderate to high powered flash.
customer_reviews.author: Nic Coplin

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, good pictures especially for the price point, just didn’t realize the pictures were so small but it is a great quality for the price, might purchase the wide version too!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this camera to work for my coworkers farewell celebration. It was great that she was able to leave with memories of all of her coworkers. My coworkers and friends love this camera and have asked me where I got it. It definitely offers a fun alternative to digital pics.
customer_reviews.author: KatRod

customer_reviews.title: Excited!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift, so far I'm really liking it. It doesn't seem cheaply made and will make a great addition to my collection. This would be perfect for fun day activities.
customer_reviews.author: Tor

customer_reviews.title: Cute pictures and super simply camera
customer_reviews.text: This is great and its small so you can take it almost anywhere. Pictures come out great. It does have a few setting which can take some time to get used to but there are tutorials on youtube.
customer_reviews.author: Kenya Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this! Reminds me of when I was a kid. My grandmother was the queen of Polaroid. The I get a little choked up with the Nostalgia
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Jones

customer_reviews.title: Instant Camera with Style
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife over Christmas and she loves it. This particular model was the perfect choice for what she wanted. Very great to capture memories quickly. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Makes an excellent gift!
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this to my girlfriend on her graduation and she is very happy with it. It's easy to carry and use and the pictures turn out to be great!
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera, very easy to use and load film cartridges in. Pictures are obviously small but thats a given I would highly recommend buying a protective case for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome addition for a vacation!!
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging, definitely unopened. Lightweight and adorable. Comes with batteries and very good descriptive manual. First two pictures I took were with flash and differently ranges of color at night. Really good quality and overall satisfied with my money!
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I take this every time we travel and are always complimented on it. It even has reflective glass so you can take a selfie pretty accurately. It is also MUCH better than the older models at detecting light and adjusting focus as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Benl324

customer_reviews.title: Relatively good in low light but this isn't really the format ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because we had misplaced our original which was a cheaper version of this. Once we found the old one, we just kept using this one because it works so well! Relatively good in low light but this isn't really the format for low light detail
customer_reviews.author: Suzi

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Sis in law loves it. If you’re not good at taking photos then the photos will be bad. So practice and use it. It’s brings back my memories from 20 years ago
customer_reviews.author: frank l.

customer_reviews.title: Great but small prints and expensive per print cost
customer_reviews.text: Was purchased for a 18yr who really likes the camera however the prints are a little small. Based on the size of the camera, I was thinking they would be a bit bigger - read the details carefully. UPDATE - the batteries are expensive and didn't factor into the operating cost, also the film is not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: DanH

customer_reviews.title: the photos are surprisingly good quality but I'm still getting the hang of the ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge hit at our last family get-together, the photos are surprisingly good quality but I'm still getting the hang of the settings for night/low light. Fun and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Love being able to place these pics where I want
customer_reviews.text: Was s gift for my daughter and she loves it. Having a physical picture is great for displaying and sharing the pictures opposed to having a digital pic on my phone. I get to see her smiling face every time I get in the car where I have the picture posted. Lots of fun too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So fun for wedding and instant moment!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for wedding! Guests put their photos in album for bride & groom!
customer_reviews.author: mahoganymountainmama

product_meta.title: Fujifilm Instax Mini 70 - Instant Film Camera (White)
product_meta.description: Color:White| Style:BaseFujifilm's newest addition to the popular line of Instax cameras - Instax Mini 70. Mini 70 is the step-up model to the Mini 8 and offers a more advanced feature set, including, an updated camera design, improved picture quality, especially in dark scenes, new selfie mode with selfie mirror and a tripod socket. Designed to use Instax Mini style film.
feature_bullets: Selfie mode with built in selfie mirror
Improved picture quality, especially in dark scenes

Focusing: Motor driven 3 range switching (0.3 meter 0.6 meter/0.6 meter 3 meter/3 meter and beyond), Macro Mode (0.3 meter 0.6 meter) Normal Mode (0.6 meter 3 meter) Landscape Mode (3 meter and beyond)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,366 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
